alert.note: Alert for Jack; Montague; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Wise; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 12:27AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Montague, Young, northwestern Wise, Jack, Stephens and Palo Pinto Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1224 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bluegrove to Cisco. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mineral Wells, Graham, Breckenridge, Bowie, Jacksboro, Olney, Nocona, Chico, Graford, Bryson, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Hubbard Creek Reservoir, Possum Kingdom State Park, Gunsight, Lake Graham, Fort Richardson State Park, Lake Amon G Carter, Crystal Falls and Newport. Those working on the Storage Fire in Palo Pinto County near Possum Kingdom Lake can expect a shift to west winds between 1245 and 1 AM. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 369 and 381. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Jack; Montague; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Wise; Young
